channel.title: ROCK AND A HARD PLACE PODCAST
channel.description:
3 Hours of ass-kicking rock and Metal! From Glam, Stoner, Power Metal, AOR, even some punk and industrial thrown in. There's interviews, parodies and more!
You'll hear some of the bands songs from around the world, new bands that you've never heard before! Bands that are creating the future of Rock and Metal!
channel.itunes:subtitle: CHECK IT OUT!
channel.itunes:author: TORCH
channel.itunes:summary:
3 Hours of ass-kicking rock and Metal! From Glam, Stoner, Power Metal, AOR, even some punk and industrial thrown in. There's interviews, parodies and more!
You'll hear some of the bands songs from around the world, new bands that you've never heard before! Bands that are creating the future of Rock and Metal!

item.title: ROCK AND A HARD PLACE 46 - MISTRESS JULIYA
item.description: We talked with Canada's Fuse TV Mistress Juliya about her days hosting the Metal show "Uranium" and the Horror film she appeared in called "Gothkill".
item.dc:creator: TORCH
item.itunes:summary: We talked with Canada's Fuse TV Mistress Juliya about her days hosting the Metal show "Uranium" and the Horror film she appeared in called "Gothkill".

item.title: ROCK AND A HARD PLACE-VOLBEAT
item.description: Here's an earlier show we did with Michael Poulsen of Volbeat. They'll be touring with Metallica in North America!
item.dc:creator: TORCH
item.itunes:summary: Here's an earlier show we did with Michael Poulsen of Volbeat. They'll be touring with Metallica in North America!
